author: Andrew Probyn
title: Morrison lobbies for greater international health oversight, possibly by ditching WHO
description: Prime Minister Scott Morrison lobbies world leaders including Donald Trump and Angela Merkel for an international body to be given wide-reaching inspection powers — similar to a weapons inspector — with the goal of preventing another pandemic.
content:
Posted 
April 22, 2020 16:22:46
Prime Minister Scott Morrison is seeking to build an international coalition to give the World Health Organisation (WHO) or another body powers equivalent to those of a weapons inspector to avoid another catastrophic pandemic… [+3142 chars]
